maqras.text: 23|75|arau yadi ami sihamtara prati daya karao arau sihamtara dukha-dain'ya dura karai di'om tathapi'o sihamte abadhyatata bibhraantara darae ghurai thakiba.
23|76|Arasye ami sihamtaka sastira dbaraa satarka karailo, tathapi'o sihamte nija pratipalakara prati aranata naha’la arau binita hai praarthana'o nakaraile.
23|77|Arasesata yetiya ami sihamtara oparata kono kathina sastira duraara khuli dima tetiyahe sihamte hatasa hai paraiba.
23|78|Teraemi tomalokara babe sraranasakti, drstisakti arau antarasamuha srsti karaiche; kintu tomaloke khube'i kama krtajnata prakasa karaa.
23|79|Teraemi tomalokaka prthiraita bistrta karaiche arau tomalokaka te'omra ocarate'i samabeta karaa ha’ba.
23|80|Teraemi jirana dana karae arau teraemi mrtyu pradana karae, te'omra adhikarate'i raati arau dinara paraibartana haya. Tathapi'o tomaloke buji noporaa ne
23|81|baram sihamte'o se'i kathake'i kaya yi katha sihamtara purbarartisakale kaichila.
23|82|Sihamte kaya, ‘yetiya ami mrtyubarana karaima arau ami mati o asthita parainata hama, tara pichato ami punaraut'thita hamane
23|83|‘arasye amaka arau itipurbe amara purbapurausasakalako ene dharanara pratisrauti diya haichila. Eya purbararti sakalara upakathara bahirae ana eko nahaya’.
23|84|Koraa, ‘prthirai arau iyata yi ache se'i sakalo(ra adhikara) kara? Yadi tomaloke jana (tente koraa)’.
23|85|Arasye sihamte ka’ba, ‘allahara’. Koraa, ‘tathapi'o tomaloke siksa grahana nakaraiba ne’
23|86|koraa, ‘sapta akasa arau maha arachara raba kona’
23|87|arasye sihamte ka’ba, ‘allaha’. Koraa, ‘tathapi'o tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraiba ne’
23|88|Koraa, ‘kara hatata sakalo bastura kartrtba? Yijane asraya dana karae athaca te'omra bipakse konorae'i kako asraya diba noraarae, yadi tomaloke jana (tente koraa)’.
23|89|Arasye sihamte ka’ba ‘allaha’. Koraa, ‘tente ka’ra paraa tomaloke yadugrasta haicha’
23|90|baram ami sihamtara ocarata satya lai ahicho; niscaya sihamta michaliya.

23|91|Allahe kono santana grahana karaa na'i, arau te'omra lagata ana kono ilaha'o na'i; yadi thakilehemtena tente pratyeka ilahe nija nija srstika lai prthaka hai ga’lehemtena arau ejane anajanara oparata praadhan'ya bistara karailehemtena. Sihamte allahara prati yibora araopa karae se'iborara paraa te'om ati paraitra ati mahana
23|92|gopana arau prakasya sakalo bisaye te'om jnata, eteke sihamte yi ansi karae tara paraa te'om bahu urd'dhata.
23|93|Koraa, ‘he mora raba! Yi bisaye sihamtaka pratisrauti pradana karaa haiche, tumi yadi seya moka (mora jirana kalate) dekhuraaba bicaraa
23|94|‘teneha’le, he mora raba! Tumi moka yalima sampradayara antarbhukta nakaraiba’.
23|95|Arau ami sihamtaka yi bisaye pratisrauti dana karaicho, arasye seya ami tomaka dekhuraabalai saksama.
23|96|Satkarmarae asatkarmaka pratihata karaa; sihamte (amara prati) yi araopa karae se'i samparke ami sabisesa aragata.
23|97|Arau koraa, ‘he mora raba! Ma'i cayatanara praraocanara paraa tomara ocarata asraya praarthana karao’.
23|98|‘Arau he mora raba! Mora ocarata sihamtara (cayatanaborara) upasthitara paraa ma'i tomara ocarata asraya praarthana karao’.
23|99|Arasesata yetiya sihamtara karaobara ocarata mrtyu ahe, tetiya si kaya, he mora raba! Moka akau ubhata'i diya

23|100|yate ma'i satkarma karaiba parao yito ma'i agate karaa nachilo. Nahaya, e'ito ketiya'o nahaba. Si yi kaiche niscaya seya eta bakya matra. Punaraut'thanara dirasa laike sihamtara sanmukhata thakiba barayakha.
23|101|Eteke yidina sinata phum diya ha’ba se'idina parasparara majata atmiyatara kono bandhana nathakiba arau konorae'i karao bisaye sodha-poca nakaraiba
23|102|eteke yisakalara tulacani gadhura ha’ba te'omloke'i ha’ba saphalakama
23|103|arau yisakalara tulacani patala ha’ba, sihamte'i se'isakala loka yisakale nijarae'i ksati karaiche; sihamta jahannamata sthayi ha’ba.
23|104|Juye sihamtara mukhamandala dagdha karaiba arau sihamta tata thakiba bibhatsa ceheraata
23|105|tomalokara ocarata mora ayatasamuha tilarata karaa horaa na'ine? Athaca tomaloke seya asbikara karaichila.
23|106|Sihamte ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Durbhagya'i amaka paraajaya karaichila arau ami achilo eta pathabhrasta sampradaya
23|107|‘he amara raba! E'i agnira paraa amaka mukta karaa; iyara pichato yadi ami punara kupharai karao tente niscaya ami yalima hama’.
23|108|Allahe ka’ba, ‘tomaloke nikrsta arasthata iyate'i thaka arau mora lagata kono katha nakaba’.

23|109|Mora bandasakalara majata enekuraa eta dala achila yisakale kaichila, ‘he amara raba! Ami imana anicho, eteke tumi amaka ksama karaa arau amara prati daya karaa, arau tumi sarbasraestha dayalu’.
23|110|‘Kintu te'omlokaka lai tomaloke imana thatta-bidraupa karaichila ye, seya tomalokaka mora smarana paharaa'i dichila. Tomaloke te'omlokara bisaye kerala upahasahe karaichila’.
23|111|Niscaya ami te'omlokara dhairyara karane aji ami te'omlokaka puraskrta karailo; niscaya te'omloke'i saphalyamandita.
23|112|Allahe ka’ba, ‘tomaloke prthiraita kimana bachara arasthana karaichila’
23|113|sihamte ka’ba, ‘ami arasthana karaichilo edina athaba dinara kichu ansa; eteke tumi gananakarai sakalaka sudhi coraa’.
23|114|Te'om ka’ba, ‘tomaloke ati kama samayahe arasthana karaichila; yadi tomaloke niscitabharae janiba parailahemtena
23|115|‘tomaloke bhabichila neki ye, ami tomalokaka anarthaka srsti karaicho arau tomalokaka amara ocaralaike ubhata'i ana naha’ba
23|116|Eteke allaha mahimamaya, prakrta malika, te'omra bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i; teraemi sanmanita arachara raba.

23|117|Arau yiye allahara lagate ana kono upasyaka ahbana karae, yi bisaye tara ocarata kono pramana na'i, tara hicapa-nikaca kerala tara pratipalakara ocarata, niscaya kaphirasakala saphala ha’ba noraaraiba.
23|118|Arau koraa, ‘he mora raba! Ksama karaa arau daya karaa, arau tumiye'i sarbasraestha dayalu’.
